name: Medieval Cook
description:
Explore a fantasy world. Fight to gather ingredients and keep customers at bay. Cook and serve dishes to travellers and locals in your tavern to earn an income for future adventures.

 Medieval Cook is a game about cooking and fighting, where you have to manage a tavern that your father has left for you amidst his disappearance. Your goals are simple: Manage the tavern, fight to learn new skills and gather ingredients and unfold the mystery behind your father's sudden disappearance. No tale will be left untold!

Credits:

Lead Game Designer Aubrey Greyling

Game Design Developer Hermanus Marais

Lead Artist  Annabelle Keet

Special Thanks to:
